job.title: MERN Stack Developer Needed for Unfinished Tasks
job.description:
We're in the crucial stages of a web development project and require an experienced MERN Stack Developer to tackle a series of unfinished tasks. The ideal candidate will be someone who can jump into the project with minimal supervision, quickly understand the existing codebase, and efficiently work towards completing the pending tasks.

Tasks Include:
Finalizing backend APIs in Node.js and Express
Completing front-end React components and ensuring responsiveness
Integrating MongoDB for data management solutions
Debugging and optimizing current functionalities for better performance
Implementing additional features based on the project requirements
Required Skills and Experience:
Strong proficiency in JavaScript, including familiarity with ES6+
Proven experience with React.js, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB
Ability to write clean, readable, and well-documented code
Experience with RESTful API services
Understanding of version control tools, such as Git
Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to work independently
Project Duration & Payment:
Immediate start required
Expected completion within [specify timeline, e.g., 2 weeks]

Payment will be project-based. Please provide your quote along with your application.

customFields.generatedDescriptionAI:
We are looking for a skilled MERN Stack Developer to help us complete some unfinished tasks on a project. The job is expected to last for 1 to 3 months. 

The ideal candidate should have expertise in Node.js, web development, and React. They should have a strong understanding of the MERN (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) stack and be able to work independently.

The main responsibilities of the candidate will be to complete the remaining tasks on the project and ensure that all functionalities are working properly. The candidate should be able to troubleshoot any issues that arise and provide innovative solutions.

To apply for this job, please submit a proposal outlining how you can contribute to the project. Please include links to your past completed projects that demonstrate your skills and expertise in MERN stack development. We look forward to reviewing your proposal and discussing the project further.
